person.persName: John P. Campbell (Christian County, Kentucky, planter and asylum manager)

body.p: Christian County, Kentucky, planter and asylum manager. Virginia native. Married to Mary A. Campbell. Father of John P. Campbell, Francis B. Campbell, Mary Campbell, and Susan B. Campbell. Planter in Christian County in 1850 and 1860. Owned fifty-eight enslaved persons in 1850 and ninety-three in 1860. Board member and manager of the Western Lunatic Asylum.
